name: War Magic
description: Tactical mages who blend offensive and defensive techniques for battle.

2.name: Arcane Deflection
2.description: When you are hit by an attack or fail a saving throw, use your reaction to gain +2 AC against the attack or +4 to the saving throw. After using this feature, you can cast only cantrips until the end of your next turn.

2.name: Tactical Wit
2.description: Add your Intelligence modifier to initiative rolls.

6.name: Power Surge
6.description: Store up to a number of power surges equal to your Intelligence modifier. You start each day with one, gain one when you successfully end a spell with dispel magic or counterspell, and gain one after a short rest if you have none. Spend a surge to deal extra force damage equal to half your wizard level to a target of your spell.

10.name: Durable Magic
10.description: While you maintain concentration on a spell, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and saving throws.

14.name: Deflecting Shroud
14.description: When you use Arcane Deflection, choose up to three creatures within 60 feet; each takes force damage equal to half your wizard level.
